short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keep your tab game under control

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Let Albert bot clean up your old tabs, letting you focus on your work without being bogged down by 1000+ opened tabs. Albert lets you define rules for tabs, allowing your to keep your important ones open while closing old unused tabs.
